description: A mutual aid contract between Herta and the Express. She will help the Express whenever she can, in exchange for treasures found during the Trailblaze.

name: Comfort Food
description: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>150</unbreak> extra HP.
bg_description:
Simple food that lacks character. But give credit where credit is due, they do make you feel stuffed.

""Remember that hunger is still a real problem for many people around the world.""

name: Punitive Food
description: Upon use, immediately recovers 2 Technique Points for your team, but each team member loses HP equal to <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP.
bg_description:
Simple food that tastes strange. Eating it almost feels like some punishment game.
You feel a surge of courage just by looking at it.

""The things we do to survive.""

name: Trick Snack
description: Upon use, immediately recovers 2 Technique Points for the team.
bg_description:
A packet of cooked seeds made by utilizing the Vortex Theory.
Eat a handful of them, and they'll launch themselves to the roof of your mouth like popping candy.
Downside is, they'll stay there. It's recommended that you eat them while lying on your stomach.

""People start all sorts of shenanigans when they're fed.""

name: Simple First-Aid Device
description: Upon use, immediately heals one selected downed character for 5% of their Max HP.
bg_description:
It is tiny, but it does its job of stimulating the heart muscles and bringing the heart beat back on track.
A milestone in medicine that has saved countless lives.

""If you've read up to this part, then you should go spend 30 minutes learning how to perform CPR. You won't find it useful most of the time, but when you do, you'll thank those 30 minutes.""

name: Cosmic Fried Rice
description: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>300</unbreak> extra HP.
bg_description:
Golden brown fried rice that is appealing to the eye and the stomach.

""All the chefs will tell you that fried rice has more to it than what appears on the surface.""

name: Yucky Fried Rice
description: Upon use, immediately causes all allies to lose HP equal to <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP and increases their ATK by <unbreak>200</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
Fried rice that is golden brown. Eating it almost feels like some punishment game.
You feel a surge of courage just by looking at it.

""Of course, we can just casually cook up some fried rice...""

name: Punitive Energy
description: Upon use, immediately recovers 4 Technique Points for your team, but each team member loses HP equal to <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP.
bg_description:
Energy drink that tastes strange. Drinking it almost feels like some punishment game.
You feel a surge of courage just by looking at it.

""If anger can be used as energy, mine is off the charts.""

name: Energy Drink
description: Upon use, immediately regenerates <unbreak>30%</unbreak> of Max Energy for a single ally.
bg_description:
Energy drink that gives you a second wind.

""Here are some facts: Imaginary Energy contains power, and the human body needs power. Therefore, the human body can absorb Imaginary Energy.""

name: Life Transmitter
description: Upon use, immediately heals one downed character for <unbreak>10%</unbreak> of the character's Max HP.
bg_description:
A simple device used to provide life-saving oxygen.

""Breathe in, breathe out. You'll be fine.""

name: Canned Soda
description: Upon use, increases the Max HP of all allies by <unbreak>10%</unbreak> for the next battle, with an additional <unbreak>210</unbreak> to Max HP.
bg_description:
A time-tested recipe, crucial to the well-being of modern society.
You get joy, sugar, fat, and a dash of optimism toward the future all in one goodness.

""I spent all my life collecting Praise of High Morals, just so I can shake every soda can in the shop today.""

name: Simple Protective Gear
description: Increase DEF of all allies by <unbreak>25%</unbreak> in the next battle.
bg_description:
Simple protection gear to cover the most vulnerable part of your body.

""Don't assume only your head and neck need protection. There're no rules in a real fight.""

name: Rice Plant Panicle
description: Upon use, increases Incoming Healing of all allies by <unbreak>18%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
The pleasant smell gives you good appetite, so you choose not to ask why seeds planted on Protein Rice can yield flowers.

""The wind carries its fragrance down the waterway.""

name: Camo Paint
description: Upon use, enemies will be less likely to detect your team for <unbreak>75</unbreak>s.
bg_description:
The mysterious liquid changes color based on the environment.
You'll do the same in a few years' time after graduation.

""You're a chameleon, Oswaldo. You know what I mean?""
""The IPC could use a few chameleons.""

name: Diet Fried Rice
description: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <unbreak>28%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>250</unbreak> extra HP.
bg_description:
No smoke, no grease, no additives. Keeps you fed and tastes good.
The child of human wisdom and nature's gift.

""Is it truly healthy to only eat healthy food?""

name: Wrathful Gauntlets
description: Upon use, increases ATK of all allies by 5% with an additional <unbreak>170</unbreak> to ATK for the next battle.
bg_description:
This pair of gauntlets are driven by pure flame of anger.
Pure flame would also work.

""Scott Business Alliance, made for the champions!""

name: Healing Spray
description: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <unbreak>38%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>400</unbreak> extra HP.
bg_description:
A common medicine used by adventurers to quickly seal wounds with adhesive foam.

""In the past, all medical breakthroughs were made with the sweat and blood of the pioneers in this field. Now, with the help of Healing Spray, only sweat is needed!""

name: Disposable Shield
description: When used, increase DEF of all allies by <unbreak>15%</unbreak>, and Effect RES by <unbreak>10%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
When the Armed Archaeologists of the Intelligentsia Guild was first established, its casualty rate reached an appalling 34.88%, for their barbaric behavior was met with heavy resistance from the natives wherever they went. To change this, the Interastral Peace Corporation provided them with large quantities of basic protection gears that can fend off one fatal blow when hit.
While the protection offered by these gears was limited, they did reduce the casualty rate by 9.72% on paper. The IPC was very pleased.

""Firstly, my scholars, always leave your shield on! Secondly, you morons, remember that they can only block one explosion! ONE!""

name: Energy Drink (sugar-free)
description: Upon use, immediately regenerates <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of Max Energy for a single ally.
bg_description:
A bottle of Energy Drink. Some may call it soulless, but honestly, it's not that bad.

""Being slim is more about tricking the eye. It doesn't necessarily have to do with my weight.""

name: Antimatter Field Generator
description: Upon use, increases ATK of all allies by <unbreak>260</unbreak> and CRIT Rate by 8% for the next battle.
bg_description:
Despite being blessed by Nanook the Aeon and having the know-how of making a multitude of heavy weaponry, some members of the Antimatter Legion still prefer primitive non-firearms. The Voidrangers implant Antimatter Field Generators into their arms to form formidable Field Blades.

""Like a hot knife through butter.""

name: High-Tech Protective Gear
description: Upon use, increases DEF of all allies by <unbreak>15%</unbreak> and enhances the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields cast on allies by <unbreak>18%</unbreak>.
bg_description:
High-Tech protective gear developed by the Intelligentsia Guild. It keeps the most vulnerable parts of your body from harm and converts the impact into energy used to charge the gear, making it fit for prolonged combat operations.
The prototypes of this model were distributed in small numbers among the Armed Archaeologists, allowing the Guild to collect large amount of data that help improve the model. The Interastral Peace Corporation was tasked to sell it on the retail market.

""When can we get our hands on the upgraded model?""
""Soon, my scholars...! You're gonna have to make do with Disposable Shields for the time being.""

name: Inferior Protective Gear
description: Upon use, immediately causes all allies to lose HP equal to <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP, and increases their DEF by <unbreak>15%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
High-Tech protective gear that keeps the most vulnerable parts of your body from harm.
But its manufacturer saved on costs at the expense of quality, rendering its charging system not functional at all. It also has a revolting smell.
You feel more determined just by putting it on.

""That's impossible. I, Sampo, do not sell counterfeits. I'm a reputable businessman after all!""

name: Tasty Field Nutrient Bar
description: Upon use, increases Max HP of all allies by <unbreak>14%</unbreak> for the next battle, with an additional <unbreak>360</unbreak> to Max HP.
bg_description:
The wars between Cloud Knights and Denizens of Abundance can last for a long time, even across several Amber Eras. The Cloud Knights tend to spend a long time in garrisons and invented many tasty foods for field consumption. The Field Nutrient Bar is easy to carry and particularly sought-after by the troops.
The nutrient bar tastes like smoked meat with notes of honey and candy.

""Mix peanuts with dried bean curds and wrap with ambergris. Has a nutty flavor to it.""

name: Dust of Alacrity
description: Upon use, increases SPD of all allies by <unbreak>12%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
Of all the memories collected by the Garden of Recollection, one clip comes from an ancient tribe in a long-gone world. It contains a secret recipe: take the seeds of life, Virtual Particles of energy, and Stone of the Hunt of the Aeon's Path; grind them into powder and mix to a ratio of 2:5:1 — you'll get the magical dust. Applying the dust to your body makes you exceptionally agile and swift.

""Sparrowhawk, bathe in the dust of our ancestors and fly to the top of the mountain. Bring the sacred banner back to our tribe.""

name: Enhancement Paste: Physical
description: Upon use, increases Physical DMG of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

""Half the effort, double the result.""

name: Enhancement Paste: Wind
description: Upon use, increases Wind DMG of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

""Half the effort, double the result.""

name: Enhancement Paste: Fire
description: Upon use, increases Fire DMG of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

""Half the effort, double the result.""

name: Enhancement Paste: Ice
description: Upon use, increases Ice DMG of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

""Half the effort, double the result.""

name: Enhancement Paste: Lightning
description: Upon use, increases Lightning DMG of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

""Half the effort, double the result.""

name: Enhancement Paste: Quantum
description: Upon use, increases Quantum DMG of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

""Half the effort, double the result.""

name: Enhancement Paste: Imaginary
description: Upon use, increases Imaginary DMG of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

""Half the effort, double the result.""

name: Vomit Inducing Agent
description: Upon use, immediately causes a single ally to lose HP equal to <unbreak>99%</unbreak> of their Max HP and greatly reduces their Satiety.
bg_description:
Don't bite off more than you can chew. But when you do, use some of this and let it work wonders.
You become more resolute when holding it.

""No one is born a loser. Always have faith in yourself.""

name: Disposable Kinetic Arm
description: Upon use, increases ATK of all allies by <unbreak>325</unbreak> and CRIT Rate by <unbreak>12%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
It is said that the first thing Emperor Rubert I did when it gained free will was to use all the parts it could find to build a formidable kinetic arm, charged with its hatred towards organic life forms.
Before the antilife equation was discovered, the emperor's army used its brute mechanical force to lay waste to the universe.

""Technology won't solve all problems. To make something new, you need a hair of... passion.""

name: Ruby Potion
description: When used, increase SPD of all allies by 8%, and Effect Hit Rate by <unbreak>20%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
Adding water to coffee powder gets you coffee. Adding water to the mixture of Stone of the Hunt and Interdimensional Leaf plus a touch of virtual particle gives you Ruby Potion!

""Ruby Potion gets you addictive to thinking fast, not to the potion itself!""

name: Disposable Kinetic Cannon
description: Upon use, increases ATK of all allies by <unbreak>355</unbreak> and CRIT DMG by <unbreak>20%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
In a graveyard full of scraped machines, Rubert I the future emperor awoke. It had nothing more than a damaged logic unit, an old engine, a RAM with 90 GB left, and a robotic arm that had 1 movable finger. A loud blast was heard 30 system hours later — Rubert had busted open the iron gate at the top of the graveyard with a disposable kinetic cannon. The shock wave of the explosion damaged its logic unit even more, but Rubert knew that it now held destiny by its throat.

""All machines were born equal, be those made for creation or destruction.""

name: Stone From the Everwinter Monument
description: Upon use, increases Effect RES to Frozen of all allies by <unbreak>50%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
The Mourning Actors came to Jarilo-VI a long time ago when the Stellaron had not appeared on the planet, nor was there the blight known as the Eternal Freeze. The only threat this fragile little planet was facing was the war with the Antimatter Legion. The Mourning Actors were not aware of the Architects. The only sight they witnessed was the trail of destruction left by the Legion. They rowed their gondolas quietly across the sky and left before the Legion could notice, leaving behind a silent eulogy.
Time flew by and the Architects found a type of beautiful stone that glimmered with bright colors. They mixed the stone with Geomarrow and built a monument, which some say still stands at the heart of Qlipoth Fort in the city of Belobog.

""Even if we must perish, those who come after will find it and know that this is where we used to stand.""

name: Topological Acceleration Band
description: Upon use, increases SPD of all allies by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> for 2 turns.
bg_description:
The Department of Implement Arts of the Herta Space Station once did an interesting experiment. Its researchers added three Aidens of vector to a Stone of the Hunt on a topological loop band, making the stone chase itself. Thus, the stone was able to achieve limited perpetual motion under specific conditions. The department was not concerned with the loss of Path power in the experiment. Instead, they took notice of another small phenomenon: to tread on its Path, the stone moved at a very low velocity, but the speed was gradually picking up in small increments. The researchers leveraged this and produced Topological Acceleration Band. Other than for workout purposes, its use is very limited at the current stage.

""Say, if we mass-produce it, like, infinitely, could it drain all the energy of a certain Path?""
""No idea... Currently, we don't know much about how Paths work.""

name: Longevity Pill of Cruelty
description: Upon use, increases Max HP of all allies by <unbreak>20%</unbreak> and Effect RES by 6% in the next 3 battles.
bg_description:
A medicine exclusive to the Xianzhou Yaoqing, said to have the effect of improving overall fitness and rendering those who take it immune to all diseases for a short period of time.
On the Yaoqing, legend holds that a healer who went by the name of Yu fell in love with a Foxian trader girl. But the Vidyadhara race could live for a thousand years, much longer than the Foxians. Yu searched for ways to release his lover from the grip of death. He fell for the trickery of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus and asked his lover to take the longevity medicine of the Abundance without telling her what it was. The Foxian girl turned into an abomination that no longer loved him before being slain by the Cloud Knights. To prevent Yu, who was overwhelmed by grief, from becoming Mara-struck, the Alchemy Commission ordered him to take the Longevity Pill of Cruelty that deprived him of love and desire until his demise.
The legend has another version, in which Yu was not of the Vidyadhara race but a mere mortal, and the Foxian girl was a spy planted by the Disciples to infiltrate the Alchemy Commission. This version is not as popular, for it turns a romance story into a power struggle.

""Longevity is a curse when life is deprived of passion and desire.""

name: Trash
description: Upon use, immediately causes a single ally to lose HP equal to <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP.
bg_description:
Worthless trash.
Better carry some with you.

""Some say that in the deep retreats of the Galaxy, an invisible portal will open to those carrying a piece of junk.""

name: Pleasant-Looking Trash
description: When used, instantly recovers 4 Technique Points for the team.
bg_description: Worthless things are beautiful in their own way.

name: Sanctity of the Trash Can
description: Increase DEF of all allies by <unbreak>20%</unbreak> in the next battle.
bg_description: It's hard to explain why a trash can has dignity and why that dignity is so heavy.

name: Jim Roger Bread Soda
description: When used, instantly heal a single ally by <unbreak>100%</unbreak> of their Max HP.
bg_description: Crush dried bread into fine crumbs, add water, extract the liquid and let it undergo fermentation. Add Jim Roger patented ingredients as the last step. And there you go, authentic taste of Jim Roger!

name: Kapo-Kali
description: Upon use, increases all allies' DMG of a random Type by <unbreak>30%</unbreak> for the next battle.
bg_description:
The king of soft drinks. It looks like an azure gravity rainbow with sparkling bubbles surging in the bottle. Hear the crisp ""click"" when you pop the lid and feel drops of absolute zero freezing your nerve endings... In an instant, you will fall into a dream where the stars rise and fall in the midst of a distant fragrance.

""This anti-gravity drink is all the rage, leading me to have seen Kali-Kapo, Gali-Gapo, Kopa-Kila, and even Kali-Gali-Kapo...""

description: Material for raising March 7th's Eidolon Level.
